body.notes: Tea-like. It works fine as the complexity is in everything else.

finish.notes: Mostly disappears with that cool, minty feel. I like this.

flavor: Plum juice is the main attraction, with a woody base. Body is tea-like and finish disappears quickly. This cup was '3D' and quite well balanced.
actionItem: Try a 7 second swirl bloom to compare. Does it mellow out the fruit note even more?
